attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The very character, way of life, well being, functionality and security of the United Kingdom has changed for its people beyond recognition and to the detriment of its people and stability generally. This is directly attributable to the incompetence of the Prime Minister and his predecessor. The Prime Minister should stand down, before he further damages the country, its people, his government and the labour party.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
